name: Escapade (Seudo Nimm (Jawad Usman))
description:
You and your friend have been kept in secret experimental science lab. You have been experimented on so much you ascended beyond this mortal realm and obtained omniscience, your friend however turned into a slime. Use your newfound powers to create constructs to build paths and protection so your friend can safely exit the lab and exact revenge.

Ludum Dare 46
